thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: C browne

author: C browne
title: C browne
text:
I have booked a number of trips to the Balearic Islands over the past 4 or 5 years and have found Flighthubs service to be very efficient. There have never been scheduling problems. I travel from Canada and booked a flight without realizing that i had paid for it in US dollars instead of Canadian. The Flighthub operater cancelled the booking for me right away and i was able to re-book a few days later paying in CAD.
Flighthub prices are always competitive and usually the cheapest available and their booking system is very user friendly.
